Issue.Title: Visual Studio crashed when type { object = ref
Ref-assigning to array elements should produce an error
3 changes around editorconfig
open document doesn't get DocumentClosed events when solution is closed while file is open in editor
Newly added .editorconfig only applied after reloading files

Issue.Title: No way to compile a VB NetModule that has InternalsVisibleTo access to a strong named assembly
C# does not diagnose InternalsVisibleTo between strong and weak named assembly
`null` default value for non-nullable parameter should warn

Issue.Title: It looks like IDiscardSymbols returned by SemanticModel are never going to be equal
Expose IsAssignableTo from SemanticModel
Make Readonly doesn't have a description for the Error List
Make Readonly doesn't have a description for the Error List

Issue.Title: "Use auto property" code fix loses initialized value
The Error List shows different results based on whether you've ever opened a source file
"Open Files" analysis doesn't occur on files that were opened from a previous solution session
Bumping diagnostic severity for some IDE analyzers to error/warning doesn't cause it to run for closed files.
Naming violation code fix should strip known common prefixes
The LDM decided to try : instead of => in the switch expression syntax.
IEventAssignmentOperation.EventReference is null when event access is parenthesized or erroneous
Exception binding bad ref
Binding DynamicMemberAccess expressions crashes VS
Added member classification support for c#.
Export classification type definitions for new classification types
Export classification type definitions for new classification types
Type to generate not inferred in expression bodied getter
Type to generate not inferred in expression bodied getter
IUsingOperation should have ```ImmutableArray<ILocalSymbol> Locals { get; }``` property
Simplify code for CInt(Math.Ceiling(x))
Production code changes to aid with test stabilization
Cannot create naming rules for type parameters and local variables
Naming style for local functions
StackOverflow binding T? in constraint

IObjectCreationExpression API shape
IOperation API shape for object and collection initializer expressions
Missing Field/Property reference expression nodes in object creation initializer node

Handle special edge case in simplification
Add `IInvalidInvocationExpression` interafce
`IHasArgumentsExpression.ArgumentsInEvaluationOrder` in C# should not use private implementation
Default argument operation doesn't handle caller info attributes

IOperation: What is the value of ParamArray arguments?
A combination of discard with arglist crashes compiler

Turn on the Roslyn EE for .NET Native
